name: Cactus Maker (Maria Trandafir)
description:
Welcome to ,, Cactus Maker" game!

To change the pot, plant or back decoration, press the corresponding buttons.Press the 1,2 or 3 keys to change the music !! 

I hope you really like the idea and , of course, the final project. If you have any ideas with what I can improve this project, please let me know in the comments!

Thank you for playing my game!
